S04bsu026_u:1_0_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ madhye viharati sma pāṇḍukambalakalpe śilātale jitāśvādimahāśrāvakaiḥ
S04bsu026_u:1_0_2: śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa gandharvarājena pañcaśikhena ca sārdham /
S04bsu026_u:1_1_0: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ utthāyāsanāt ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānuṃ merupṛṣṭhe 'vaṣṭabhya yena
S04bsu026_u:1_1_1: bhaganān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ete hi bhagavan devāḥ caityanamaskriyāmaṇḍanāḥ etatpariṣanmaṇḍalapatitāḥ
S04bsu026_u:1_1_2: kathamapi brahmacaryapuṇyaprasavāḥ sadevake samārake sabrahmake loke saśramaṇabrāhmaṇaprajāsu bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaḥ upāsakopāsikāḥ
S04bsu026_u:2_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu026_u:2_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
S04bsu026_u:3_2_0: sa tathāgataṃ paśyati / yaśca avalokiteśvara kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā śraddhāsamanvitaḥ apratiṣṭhite pṛthivīpradeśe āmalakamātraṃ
S04bsu026_u:3_2_1: caityaṃ sūcīmātraṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ bakulapuṣpamātraṃ chatraṃ kṛtvā pratītyasamutpādadharmadhātugāthāṃ paṭhati,
S04bsu026_u:3_4: itaḥ pracyāvya maraṇakālaṃ kṛtvā brahmaloke utpadyate /
S04bsu026_u:3_5: tataḥ pracyāvya kālaṃ kṛtvā śuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmutpadyate /
S04bsu026_u:4_0: evamavocadbhagavān / sa rve ca te śrāvakāḥ, te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S04bsu026_u:4_1: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣat, sadevamanuṣyāsuragandharvalokaśca bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan /
